about_the_game:
Ghost Kickers! is a top-down action-adventure inspired by classics from the 16-bit era. Choose an exorcist from a range of powerful heroes, each with their own weapons and mystical skills. Battle an army of yokai to save the world from chaos.

Game Features:

  • Single-Player Story
    Embark on a grand adventure to face the yokai thread and discover a magical world filled with secrets and wonder.

  • 100-Storied Pagoda
    Test your skills as you climb a towering pagoda to become the strongest exorcist in the world.

  • Multiplayer Arena
    Challenge your friends in the arena, both offline and online and reach for the top in ranked matches.

  • Map Designer
    Create, customize, and share your own maps with a global community for endless new adventures.

  • Unique Exorcists
    Choose from a unique cast of customizable heroes, each with distinct abilities and playstyles.

Prepare to vanquish the darkness and rise as a legendary exorcist in Ghost Kickers!

short_description: In Ghost Kickers! you are an exorcist fighting against an army of yokai threatening to plunge the world into chaos. Embark on a grand solo adventure or conquer the 100-storied pagoda. Challenge your friends in the arena and design your own maps to share with the world.
